products.title: Capri Vision Scarlet Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make your windows stand out with the capri vision paradise scarlet blind. The inspired striped design in a cheerful shade of red enables you to make the most of natural light whilst enjoying enhanced privacy ideal for enhancing the look and feel of street facing rooms and adding personality to your space. Product id: db-vrbx1852 fabric colour: scarlet material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium tube with steel brackets energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes capri vision scarlet day and night blind in red.

products.title: Capri Vision Ochre Day And Night Blind
products.description: Draw your scheme together with this cheerful fabric window blind. The capri vision ochre day and night roller blind is sure to make an impact on your space thanks to the bright ochre yellow hue and practical functionality. This blind is designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst filling your interior with natural light. Product id: db-vrbx1850 fabric colour: ochre material: 100% polyester headrail: aluminium tube with steel brackets energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes capri vision ochre day and night blind in yellow.
